reviewtext: I bought this unit because it was the lowest-priced headphone I could find with a cord long enough to plug into the front panel of my PC without continually jerking out when I move, like the earphones I had been trying to use. I did not need it for enjoying music or videos; I just needed it to hang on the side of my PC tower for easy access when I need to audit something I am working on late at night while the sensible people here are sleeping. It does the job.
